title: Alias for columns in dataset not reflected in expression builder
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are still being displayed instead of the alias names that have been set for the columns.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new datasource and a dataset. 2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset as 'column1'. 3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset. The old column names should still be displayed instead of the alias names that have been set for the columns.
